__prompts__.project_slug: Theme name. The recommended is 'sphinx_<name>_theme', e.g. 'sphinx_my_awesome_theme'. Use only lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores.
__prompts__.theme_inherit: Theme parent. From which Sphinx theme your theme should inherit from? Traditional is 'basic', but 'sphinx_null_theme' is our recommended as modern alternative.
__prompts__.ablog: Do you want to support Ablog blogging extension in your theme?
